title: Jendrik
text:
Jendrik
About Jendrik
Jendrik Sigwart, born 27th August 1994, is a german singer and musical performer.
As a teen he learned to play piano and violin.
During his musical studium he already played in musicals like “My Fair Lady”, “Hairspray” and “Peter Pan”.
In his songs he likes to use his ukulele.
On 6th February 2021 it was announced that he will represent Germany at the Eurovision Song Contest 2021.
